#summary Building and running java code for those of us who know nothing about java.

Using the SWIG example:
{{{
swig -java example.i
gcc -c example_wrap.c -I/usr/include/java -I/usr/include/java/linux
gcc -c example.c
ld -G example_wrap.o example.o -o libexample.so
/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun-1.6.0.03/bin/javac *.java
/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun-1.6.0.03/bin/java main
}}}
